p.li: In most areas of life, what your child consumes forms who he is, both physically, mentally, emotionally, and spiritually.

Nutrients are involved in the formation of every cell and the maintenance of every system in our bodies. To give you some perspective, the body needs more than 45 nutrients to function optimally and maintain good health.
Nutritional medicine aims to optimize nutrition to suit the various and individual biochemical, environmental, and health status of the patients.
